name: TRASH OUT (ShaiDayan)
description:
A co-op game about two hungry and greedy raccoons that want to have a nice meal. Try to be as quiet as you can while stealing your neighbors' trash cans. Shh! Breaking stuff can be noisy... You'll have to pass the trash between you too in order to stay quiet.

Controls:

Player 1 - ARROWS

Player 2 - WASD

This game was made as part of the "Game Jam" course in Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design in collaboration with The Hebrew University of Jerusalem.

Creators:

Yakir Bukris - Developer

Andy Benichou - Developer

Eyal Avraham - Designer

Shai Dayan - Designer
